"Aina is in front of Garoa's grave, and seems to be feeling down. She's taken advice from all kinds of people when trying to think of ways to guide her trainees, but nothing seems to work. She says she wants to find an answer before the fast-approaching reconaissance training scheduled to take place in Retem."
